title: SDG 11 Background Note
snippet: To achieve SDG 11 and realize its promise of building sustainable and resilient cities and local communities, the Arab Sustainable Development Report 2020 identified recommendations to strengthen people-centered urban planning and integrated spatial policies, to build a better urban governance framework, and to ensure the sustainable management of natural resources.

title: Technology for Development Bulletin in the Arab Region 2019
snippet: The Technology for Development Bulletin, an educational newsletter, aims to inform the reader of global technology trends and to propose a brief outline of policy recommendations that can be pursued in the Arab region to take advantage of the significant opportunities offered by Technology and Innovation. This publication includes four sections: new technologies, technology and inclusion, technology impact and governance, and ESCWA-related activities. Each section includes a number of chapters dealing with the subject from different aspects
